categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Brahtikka was a female Wookiee smuggler who often worked as an insertion specialist for the Rebel Alliance. She worked with the navigator Lelu and used the transport Spinster's Loom. She transported a team of operatives to the Shadow Raptor shortly after the Battle of Yavin.
Brahtikka appears in Fantasy Flight Games' roleplaying game 2014 adventure Dead in the Water.
